column4: How does the Synaptic Package Manager work exactly?  Does it detect new packages that you may install?
its just an interface for the apt and dpgk suites

openoffice
run this as root:

sudo -s

k gotcha
by default downloads dont have the executable permission set. Virus & user idiocy prevention

yea... forgot about that
